name: SAP Citywest Public Transport
tagline: Public transport information about getting to and from the SAP office in Dublin.
body:
# _This page is currently under construction!_

***

# What is this page for? 

This page documents the modes of transport to and from SAP Citywest. There isn't much detailed information on the [Citywest Campus site](http://www.citywestcampus.com/getting_there/), and of course the SAP Employee Bus is not mentioned there as it's SAP-specific. 

# Ways to get to and from SAP Citywest, Dublin 24:

- Dublin Bus
- Luas
- SAP Bus
- Citywest D4 bus

# Dublin Bus

## Route: 69

### Stops

- Going towards town: Outside the main building

### Schedule

// TODO - Dublin Bus link

### Description

This bus is infrequent (around every hour), and takes a long time compared to the other modes of transport, as it goes on a tour of West Dublin before properly heading towards town. 

# SAP Bus

### Stops

- // TODO - Google maps coords

### Schedule

To SAP

// TODO

From SAP

Leaves outside main building at ???
Leaves outside AppHaus at 17:45

### Description

A single ticket costs €1.50, and can be purchased in the Costa cafés of either the main building or the AppHaus. 

# Authors and Contributors

@zky829
